Hamburger Menu Overlay

Project Github

About This Project

This menu only work with CSS animation without JS. As state switch uses checkbox. Just click on the menu hamburger and you'll see the magic of the CSS animation.

Budget App

Project Github

About This Project

This simple application write on JS5. In this project applied event-delegation.

How to use it: choose + (income) or -(expense) and add a description and add a value. This application has a total budget (income - expenses), also a total percent of expenses and individual percent of the expense.

Forkify

Project Github

About This Project

This application based on food2fork API. Technology applied to this project: ES6, npm, webpack, fetch API, asynchronous JS, MVC, AJAX. This app searches the recipe and you can change the amount of peoples and add to the shopping list, and also you can change a shopping list or delete shop list item.

How to use it: Type pizza in the search input. After this, on the left side you'll see a list of recipes. Click on any recipe and change amount of persons, then click on "Add to shopping list" button. And on the right side, you'll see the shopping list.
